replies.body: thats a bit nauti
*slow clap*
I guess Riot did sea what you did there.
Haha i did naut sea that pun coming.
I think that pun every time i read that name
I got the 3 points during the ocean week but my name is not up there why?? please put my name on i deserve it {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}
As far as I can tell, you didn't play any games during Ocean Week on this account. :(
BOOM
rekt
LOL
Plans look amazing, can't wait to see it finished! Nice work :)
Is my name offensive because I definitely earned at least 3 points during ocean week and my name isn't on the list?

I took a look and from what I can see, you won two games before the statue goal was reached while playing with an Ocean Week champion on your team.
You did win another game with an Ocean Week champion on your team the day after that, but that means that it did not meet the time requirement.
Ok then fair enough

I also swear i won the required 3 games with an ocean week champion and stuff, could you please check for me? sorry to be a bother but i was really excited for this and im pretty sad that my summoner name doesnt get to be on as cool a project as this!!!{{champion:32}}
:/ Im pretty sure i had enough points but oh well :P Woooo Riot OCE!~
I didn't get 3 points, but I'm still super excited for this as a Naut main :) Will you be posting pictures of it underwater when the reef is finished?

Aw nice!! Thought he was part zac for a second, other than that it looks amazing! I appreciate the effort of all of you, working on the legal matters and design! Im just personally Naut shore how this will turn out but we will all have to sea after all this is done.
{{champion:16}} Yeah, these plans look really interesting. It will be good to see it finished.

I honestly didn't think I was going on the list...when I read my name it was like {{champion:107}} jumping outta the bushes!! Loving this project so far!!! (My summoner name has since been changed from Score94)
Nice name bro!
Ahah thanks you too bro
anyone know exactly where it will be built?{{champion:111}}

The primary site is in Queensland, we'll release more specific information when approval is 100% which it isn't right now. We have already done the due diligence on backup sites if this one falls through.
Is this going to be a public exhibit or?
When the permits are approved, it will be dropped into the ocean to become an artificial reef :)
Sorry, but I do **naut** think this is a good idea... {{champion:111}} JK
Hi Riot :D <3

Looking great. I was actually thinking about this a few days ago.. kinda laughing to myself wondering if it'd been quietly canned :P
Can't wait to go dive there, here's hoping it's not in the wildest of those Australian waters ;)
your puns are naut great, but i'm sure you can reef it up a bit
This is so awesome i cant wait till its all finished the thing i love about it the most is that it will be home to so much marine life its going to be fantastic good job roit

LOL I thought you guys were actually building an artificial reef or something with a Nautilus figure simply being part of it! 
But if it's just a Nautilus sculpture then that's pretty lame.

It's an artificial reef. What you see at the moment is the primary structure. This will then have a series of holes and groves cut into it, along with specific scoring as mentioned in the news post. In effect the nautilus shape becomes the artificial reef.

My name isn't on the plaque!! I voted even for the statue!! I played during ocean week! I contacted riot support and i only received a copy paste response from the FAQ! HELP!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
My name isn't on it :(

I am positive I had more than three points as I received the free champion which you can see in my purchase history, Wondering why I'm not on their, Also I have two friends with the same problem. Is this a problem with the website or are we not on the reef?

I'm sure that I got over 3 points... How come I'm not on there? :(
Really cool doe
I'm Confused, I had well over 3 points, nor do i have a offensive name, yet my user wasn't on the board... :C
Could have sworn I got the 3 points... but my name aint on the list?
I can't find my name on there i got like 20+ points :(
Hi Riot, i am super sure that i won 3 points during the week .. can you please look!!!!!

Just wanna ask something. I think i have done more than 3 points on the Ocean Week event but I can't seem to find my name on the list above. Is it because my username consists of numbers? (R3m4iningSaiyan)

I've been left off too. Shameful considering how hard I worked to get my points up. And I've not had any notification that my username was offensive, and have found dozens of more offensive names in 15 seconds inspection of the plates. You've let me down Riot. I'm really disappointed.
I'm pretty sure I got more than 3 points during the event but my name isn't on the list (either my current or previous name).
I DID IT MUM
Looks awesome guys, keep up the good work.

As a Naut jungle main (at the time of ocean week '15) im so happy this is being made.
Im just sad Naut jungle isn't viable, let alone on par for jungle now. :(

really can't wait for his new Lore though. hell i can't wait for any of the new lore coming out.

my old summoner name rubbish is on there but i changed to big hero quite some time ago, is there any chance i can have it swapped to big hero since some other player out there is going to be on there and i'm not? :)
The names can't be changed unfortunately. This is due to the physical engraving requirements. It's just not feasable to try and keep up with name changes.
I'm pretty sure I have a different name right now than what it was in ocean week. Is there a way to find out what it was?
